product_name: Planet Bike Blaze 2-Watt Micro Front Bike Light and Superflash Turbo Rear Bike Light Combination Set
long_description: Enhancing rear visibility with an improved flashing mode and lighting the path ahead, this set includes the Planet Bike Blaze 2-Watt Micro front bike light and a Superflash Turbo rear bike light. Planet Bike Blaze 2-watt front bike light offers a 139 lumen beam to illuminate your path and enhance your visibility for oncoming motorists. Includes high and low power beams and Super Flash(TM) flashing mode; Super Flash mode is highly visible, even in daylight. Optically-advanced lens provides superior beam pattern. QuickCam(TM) mounting bracket accommodates tool-free mounting on handlebar; fits 25.4 - 31.8mm handlebars. Superflash Turbo rear light features a 1-watt LED and 2 red LEDs for visibility up to one mi. Updated Turbo flashing mode is highly visible, even in daylight. Compact vertical design is weatherproof, lightweight and durable. Includes bike mounts and clip mount for multiple mounting options. Soft-touch power switch accesses flashing or steady mode for up to 100 hrs. of run time. Includes batteries for both the Blaze (2AA) and the Superflash Turbo (2AAA).
